decision_conditions: The enlarged part of the dwellinghouse extend would extend beyond part the rear wall of the original dwellinghouse by more than 3 metres. Therefore fails to comply with paragraph A.1 (f) (i) of Class A, set out under Schedule 2, Part 1 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The enlarged part of the dwellinghouse extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and  have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse. Accordingly the proposal would not comply with paragraph A. (j) (iii) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2  of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant has failed to indicate that the materials used in any exterior work would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, in conflict with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A, Condition A.3 (a) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension.
